REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2801 reute r f BC-VIACOM-<VIA>-EXECUTIV 10-20 0055

TEXT.TITLE: VIACOM <VIA> EXECUTIVE RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY:
Viacom Inc said Gordon E. Belt has resigned as vice president, chief financial officer of Viacom Interntional Inc, effective Nov 13, 1987. The company said a successor will be announced shortly. Viacom said Belt has not announced immediate plans after his resignation.
Reuter
